actions.recommendation: Sleep is essential. Natural sleep is the best. Instead of zolpidem try melatonin (circadian) 60 min before bed time to try kickstart your circadian rhythms.
Keep avoiding fried food and try to get your fat from good fats like avo, nuts and olives. Supplement with Omega 3 2-4 g daily
Exercises 3 times a week; Good social connections
Reduce your sugar and refined carb intake. Manage your stress hormones, try to slow down, do relaxation exercises and set boundaries.
The only modifiable risk factors you can work on are your reducing your cholesterol and your waist circumference.
Low DHEA - good stress management initially. Please come back for a review if your find yourself petering and needing the supplements. Supplement with a good Vit B
